items.summary: Update the Lily page header layout (frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx) so the avatar is on the left and the text to its right is two lines: line 1 shows the pond name in bold, followed by a separator dot and the timestamp; line 2 shows the username in regular (not bold) text.

Change the avatar shown on the Lily page (frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx) to display the pond avatar (pond profile image) instead of the user avatar, with a fallback (e.g., üê∏) when the pond has no profile image.
Add a visible border to separate the lily content block from the ribbits block on the Lily page (frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx).
